reviews.review_msg: I think she is brilliant, I enjoyed attending her class. She was easy going, understanding, and helpful. I had trouble giving a presentation because I cannot do public speaking, and she was very encouraging and made me feel confident :)

It appears she is more concerned about protocol than the learning of her students; she appears out of touch with the needs and desires of HSCI students, as most bureaucrats tend to be. It is regrettable, because she is a nice woman.
